column2: "[http://lingwe.blogspot.com/2011/12/new-reviews-of-past-work.html New reviews of past work]" at [http://lingwe.blogspot.com/ Lingwë] (accessed 17 December 2011)</ref>) was a member of the humanities faculty at [[wikipedia:Pázmány Péter Catholic University|Pázmány Péter Catholic University]]
column3: and a member of the [[Hungarian Tolkien Society]]. Her courses included [[Old English|Old]] and [[Middle English]]
column5: and her lectures on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] revived interest in him in academic circles.
